name: Idol Producer
description:
Visual Clicker Game, Idol Producer
Let's become CEO of new Performing Arts Office and scout out for cute kids and collect live funds with idols who brought up.
Idol producers' idols have different individualities and abilities!
It seems easy, never a simple world, an idol producer!

Raising idols and collecting funds is boring? It is!
Battle with other users is also the real pleasure of "idol producer"!
In the battle, it is ranked by whether to collect more funds.

And it may be that you transfer the idols who brought up your hard work to another office! Is it?

Will it be able to be raised from what idle idle until becoming a national star!
This role is only for you! Please download now!
